ModMetaData.name: Camping Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Nandonalt
ModMetaData.description:
v0.4.0 Camping Stuff Mod By Nandonalt (made compatible with a17 by Alias): Adds Deployable Tents(Normal, Medium and Big), Portable Stoves and the Butchering Spot.
Changelog: v4.0- b18 support, removed sleeping bags v3.0- a17 support v2.0- enables you to make tents from any textile and adds two new sizes to tents: medium and big.
